content:
Initial release of X-editable. This library is new life of bootstrap-editable plugin (1.1.4) that was strongly refactored and improved. Main reasons caused re-branding and creation of new project are:
  • support not only bootstrap but any core library: bootstrap, jquery-ui or pure jquery
  • different container classes to show form:
    popover, tooltip, poshytip
  • inline and popup modes
  • new directory structure and logic in separate js files allowing easy extending
Please see changelog for upgrade instructions.
